products.title: Raspberries
products.summary: Fruit of a multitude of plant species
products.description: A macaroon is a small cake or cookie, typically made from ground almonds, coconut or other nuts with sugar and sometimes flavorings, food coloring, glace cherries, jam or a chocolate coating or a combination of these or other ingredients.
